This Special Skill designates the trusted non-commissioned officer of the Lieutenant, who can operate under their direct orders.

{{css_skillbox |black| NCO | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{effects}}
* Allows the user to replace any [[Lieutenant Special Order | Special Lieutenant Order]]s with [[Tactical Order]]s and to use them.
* This Special Skill does not require the NCO and the Lieutenant to be in the same [[Combat Group]].
* If the Trooper with this Special Skill is a member of a [[Fireteam]] and is designated as the Team Leader, then he may use that Tactical Order to activate their Fireteam.
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{advice-start}}
To use the [[Lieutenant Special Order | Lieutenant Order]], the Order must have been generated during the [[Order Count]]. Once generated, the Order may be spent during the [[Orders Phase]], even if the Lieutenant has entered a [[Null]] State since then.
{{advice-end}}


{{see-also-start}}
'''[[Isolated State]]'''
* '''Restriction:''' If a Trooper with the [[NCO]] Special Skill is in [[Isolated State]], they cannot replace [[Lieutenant Special Order | Special Lieutenant Orders]] with [[Tactical Order]]s or use them either.
{{see-also-end}}
